rooms.name: Throne Room
rooms.description: A majestic room with a golden throne.

rooms.name: Armory
rooms.description: Rusty weapons and armor hang from the walls.

rooms.name: Dungeon
rooms.description: Dark and damp, echoes of prisoners long gone.

rooms.name: Observatory
rooms.description: A massive telescope points at the heavens.

rooms.name: Chapel
rooms.description: Filled with cracked stained glass and eerie silence.

rooms.name: Vault
rooms.description: Sealed by magic, contains forgotten treasures.

rooms.name: Barracks
rooms.description: Dusty cots and long-forgotten armor lie here.

rooms.name: Alchemist’s Lab
rooms.description: Bubbling flasks and glowing powders everywhere.

items.name: Golden Key
items.description: Shiny and valuable, may open something important.

items.name: Ancient Coin
items.description: Stamped with a forgotten king's face.

items.name: Magic Mushroom
items.description: Glows faintly in the dark, smells odd.

items.name: Broken Mirror
items.description: Cracked but still shows a reflection.

items.name: Ancient Scroll
items.description: Written in a language you can’t read.

npcs.name: Gilda the Trader
npcs.description: A shrewd merchant always looking for a deal.
dialogue: Looking to trade, adventurer?
Gold speaks louder than words.
I have just what you need… for a price.

npcs.name: Bram the Bargainer
npcs.description: Carries odd trinkets from distant lands.
dialogue: Only the rarest goods for the cleverest buyers.
Ever seen a dragon fang? No? Want one?
I can guarantee none of this is cursed… at least not too cursed.

npcs.name: Zelma of the East
dialogue: I have what heals and what harms.
Brewed this myself. Want to try?
Fresh batch—don’t ask what’s in it.

npcs.name: Elandra the Wise
npcs.description: A seer with visions of the future.
dialogue: I foresaw your coming.
The stars whisper of a hero—are you that one?
Your path is heavy with destiny.

npcs.name: Captain Thorn
npcs.description: Needs help finding his lost crew.
dialogue: My men are missing… I need your blade.
They were last seen near the ruins.
Don’t disappoint me.

npcs.name: Elder Mira
npcs.description: Wants you to restore balance to the forest.
dialogue: The forest is sick. You can help heal it.
Seek the root shrine and light the flame.
Time is slipping away.

npcs.name: Whispy Wink
dialogue: Answer me this, if you dare!
Win the game, lose your mind.
Reality is just a suggestion.

npcs.name: Jester Vale
npcs.description: A wandering prankster with a silver tongue.
dialogue: Truth is a joke waiting to happen.
Flip a coin, lose your soul?
Laugh or cry—you choose.

npcs.name: Mira Mischief
npcs.description: Appears friendly but hides a hidden agenda.
dialogue: I’m your best friend. Or am I?
Trust is such a heavy thing to carry.
Don’t worry—unless you should.

npcs.name: Ethereal Watcher
npcs.description: A glowing figure that stares into your soul.
dialogue: Time flows differently here.
You are being watched… always.
What you see is never all you are.

npcs.name: Whispering Wraith
dialogue: The veil is thin… listen closely.
They’re coming… they’re already here.
I hear things no ear should.

npcs.name: Lost Soul
npcs.description: Trapped between realms, searching for peace.
dialogue: Have you seen the light?
I just want to go home…
Can you help me find my way?

npcs.name: Nomad Jax
npcs.description: Knows many paths through the wildlands.
dialogue: You lost? I’m not.
Maps are lies drawn by the afraid.
I’ve walked where the stars guide.

npcs.name: Lina the Seeker
npcs.description: Follows trails only she can see.
dialogue: The wind speaks. I listen.
There’s a trail in the stars.
Follow if you dare—be ready for anything.

npcs.name: Tarn the Scout
npcs.description: Has seen places no map knows.
dialogue: Danger lies ahead. Always.
Even silence has footsteps.
Stay alert. Even here.

npcs.name: Ironhelm
npcs.description: Sworn to protect the castle gates.
dialogue: No one enters without the King's word.
I don't trust easily.
Move along—or move on.

npcs.name: Sentinel Kael
dialogue: Quiet... something stirs.
Eyes open. Sword ready.
This hall demands respect.

npcs.name: Seraphina Shield
npcs.description: Wields a tower shield and unmatched resolve.
dialogue: Justice stands firm.
My shield has never fallen.
I stand for those who cannot.
